textTemplates.name: International_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.Owner_Name__c} has approved the following finance case {!$Record.CaseNumber}.

Please click the link above to complete any remaining work on this case. Once you are finished, please click 'Close Case' checkbox to close this case.

Thank you,
Finance Case Team

textTemplates.name: North_America_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.Owner_Name__c} has approved the following finance case {!$Record.CaseNumber}.

Please click the link above to complete any remaining work on this case. Once you are finished, please click 'Close Case' checkbox to close this case.

Thank you,
